title: Display Name Feature for Profile Options
description: Add a Display Name input field to the profile/options page, allowing users to set a custom name that will be shown throughout the app instead of their login username. The fullname column already exists in the database and is used via COALESCE(fullname, username) across 19+ files.

requirements.detail: Display name input field appears on the Options tab for logged-in users viewing their own profile
Display name field is NOT shown when viewing another player's profile
Current display name (if set) is pre-populated in the input field
User can save a new or updated display name
User can clear display name (empty string saves as NULL, falls back to username)
Max length of 30 characters is enforced
Invalid characters are rejected (only alphanumeric, spaces, basic punctuation, and emoji allowed)

tasks.description: Update GetStats() in farklePageFuncs.php to return raw fullname field separately from the COALESCE alias
Add display name input field to Options tab in farkle_div_playerinfo.tpl template with maxlength=30 and proper visibility controls
Update JavaScript SaveOptions() in farklePlayerInfo.js to include displayname parameter in AJAX POST
Update SaveOptions() in farklePageFuncs.php to accept displayname parameter, validate (30 char max, allowed characters only), and save to database
Update farkle_fetch.php AJAX router to pass displayname POST parameter to SaveOptions()
[ORCHESTRATOR] Final verification - verify all requirements are satisfied
tasks.note: This task is completed by the Orchestrator, NOT a coder agent
